Name: Gesso
Notes: A squid enemy that spawns a Coin when defeated. It damages the player upon contact. The player can defeat it with any attack.

Obj_arg0.Name: Initial Nerve
Obj_arg0.Description: Specifies its initial behavior. In SMG1, this setting only applies when SW_APPEAR is used.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted, frozen and defeated by player 2.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.
